Detailed Description

A ForceImpl provides the internal implementation of a Force. When a Context is created for a System, it creates a ForceImpl for each Force in the System. The ForceImpl is permitted to cache information from the Force or System which is needed to apply the force efficiently. If the user calls reinitialize() on the Context, all ForceImpl objects it had previously created are deleted and recreated from scratch.

This is an abstract class. Each Force subclass is responsible for defining its own ForceImpl subclass.

Member Function Documentation

virtual double OpenMM::ForceImpl::calcForcesAndEnergy ( ContextImpl &  context,
bool  includeForces,
bool  includeEnergy,
int  groups 
) [pure virtual]

Calculate the force on each particle generated by this ForceImpl and/or this ForceImpl's contribution to the potential energy of the system.

Parameters:
contextthe context in which the system is being simulated
includeForcestrue if forces should be calculated
includeEnergytrue if the energy should be calculated
groupsa set of bit flags for which force groups to include. Group i should be included if (groups&(1<<i)) != 0.
Returns:
this force's contribution to the potential energy of the system, or 0 if this force does not contribute to potential energy (or if includeEnergy is false)

Implemented in OpenMM::GBVIForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomCompoundBondForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomHbondForceImpl, OpenMM::NonbondedForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaVdwForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaBondForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomAngleForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomBondForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomExternalForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomGBForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomNonbondedForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::HarmonicAngleForceImpl, OpenMM::HarmonicBondForceImpl, OpenMM::PeriodicTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::RBTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaAngleForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaInPlaneAngleForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaMultipoleForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaOutOfPlaneBendForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaPiTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaStretchBendForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaWcaDispersionForceImpl, OpenMM::CMAPTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaTorsionTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::AndersenThermostatImpl, OpenMM::GBSAOBCForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaGeneralizedKirkwoodForceImpl, OpenMM::MonteCarloBarostatImpl, and OpenMM::CMMotionRemoverImpl.

virtual std::vector<std::pair<int, int> > OpenMM::ForceImpl::getBondedParticles ( ) const [inline, virtual]

Get pairs of particles connected by bonds by this force. This is used to determine which particles are part of the same molecule.

Reimplemented in OpenMM::AmoebaBondForceImpl, OpenMM::HarmonicBondForceImpl, and OpenMM::CustomBondForceImpl.

virtual std::map<std::string, double> OpenMM::ForceImpl::getDefaultParameters ( ) [pure virtual]

Get a map containing the default values for all adjustable parameters defined by this ForceImpl. These parameters and their default values will automatically be added to the Context.

Implemented in OpenMM::GBVIForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomCompoundBondForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomHbondForceImpl, OpenMM::NonbondedForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaVdwForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaBondForceImpl, OpenMM::AndersenThermostatImpl, OpenMM::CustomAngleForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomBondForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomExternalForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomGBForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomNonbondedForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::HarmonicAngleForceImpl, OpenMM::HarmonicBondForceImpl, OpenMM::PeriodicTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::RBTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaAngleForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaInPlaneAngleForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaMultipoleForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaOutOfPlaneBendForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaPiTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaStretchBendForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaWcaDispersionForceImpl, OpenMM::CMAPTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::MonteCarloBarostatImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaTorsionTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::CMMotionRemoverImpl, OpenMM::GBSAOBCForceImpl, and OpenMM::AmoebaGeneralizedKirkwoodForceImpl.

virtual void OpenMM::ForceImpl::initialize ( ContextImpl &  context) [pure virtual]

This is called after the ForceImpl is created and before updateContextState(), calcForces(), or calcEnergy() is called on it. This allows it to do any necessary initialization.

Implemented in OpenMM::CustomCompoundBondForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomHbondForceImpl, OpenMM::NonbondedForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaVdwForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaBondForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomAngleForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomBondForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomExternalForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomGBForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomNonbondedForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::HarmonicAngleForceImpl, OpenMM::HarmonicBondForceImpl, OpenMM::PeriodicTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::RBTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaAngleForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaInPlaneAngleForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaMultipoleForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaOutOfPlaneBendForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaPiTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaStretchBendForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaWcaDispersionForceImpl, OpenMM::AndersenThermostatImpl, OpenMM::CMAPTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaTorsionTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::MonteCarloBarostatImpl, OpenMM::GBSAOBCForceImpl, OpenMM::GBVIForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaGeneralizedKirkwoodForceImpl, and OpenMM::CMMotionRemoverImpl.

virtual void OpenMM::ForceImpl::updateContextState ( ContextImpl &  context) [pure virtual]

This method is called at the beginning of each time step. It give the ForceImpl a chance to modify the state variables (positions, velocities, and parameters) stored in the Context in arbitrary ways before integration is performed.

Parameters:
contextthe context in which the system is being simulated

Implemented in OpenMM::GBVIForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomCompoundBondForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomHbondForceImpl, OpenMM::NonbondedForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaVdwForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaBondForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomAngleForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomBondForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomExternalForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomGBForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomNonbondedForceImpl, OpenMM::CustomTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::HarmonicAngleForceImpl, OpenMM::HarmonicBondForceImpl, OpenMM::PeriodicTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::RBTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaAngleForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaInPlaneAngleForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaMultipoleForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaOutOfPlaneBendForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaPiTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaStretchBendForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaWcaDispersionForceImpl, OpenMM::AndersenThermostatImpl, OpenMM::CMAPTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaTorsionTorsionForceImpl, OpenMM::MonteCarloBarostatImpl, OpenMM::GBSAOBCForceImpl, OpenMM::AmoebaGeneralizedKirkwoodForceImpl, and OpenMM::CMMotionRemoverImpl.
